string.value: Is it possible to mount an Onyx Dragon? Ask #b#p1013000##k.
#p1013000# says that it shouldn't be too difficult to carry someone your size. Ah, so it is possible to mount an Onyx Dragon.
#p1013000# says that it shouldn't be too difficult to carry someone your size. Ah, so it is possible to mount an Onyx Dragon. Go inform Grendel the Old of this fact.

Master, what is it? Huh? Mounting? Isn't that like riding around on pigs or birds or wolves? What about it?\r\n#b#L0#Well, I was wondering if you think it's possible for me to ride an Onyx Dragon.#l\n#k

Ride an Onyx Dragon... HOLD ON JUST A MINUTE. What are you saying? You want to...ride me? But I'm your partner, not some little pet! How could you, master...\r\n#b#L0#Don't be silly! That's why I want to know if I can ride you. BECAUSE you're my partner...#l\n#k

Oooh, I get... Wait, huh?! Well, I suppose it would make things more convenient, but if I ever get tired, I get to ride on you, okay? \r\n#b#L0#What?! Are you trying to kill your one and only master?#l\n#k

Fine, fine. Nevermind. I was just joking anyways. If I tried to ride on your back, you'd turn into a flat old pancake. But if you want to ride me, no problem. You're not that big.\r\n#b#L0#So it's okay for me to ride on your back then?#l\n#k
Yea, why not? I can fly a whole lot faster than you anyway. But we can't just take off here and now. Two things must be prepared first.\r\n#b#L0#Two things?#l\n#k
You need a saddle and the Monster Mount skill! I don't think you'd survive long on my back without something to sit on. Think you can prepare both those things?
